content: FTPSERVE X ENDAUTOLOG ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------- ... 5. Save your changes with the FILE subcommand: ====> file 6. Repeat these steps on all other members of the SSI cluster. 6.8.2 Reconfiguring TCP/IP for high availability by using a VSWITCH The previous configuration of the TCP/IP virtual machine was only an initial configuration that was intended to activate the network stack as quickly as possible. Characteristics of VSWITCH interfaces VSWITCH interfaces have the following characteristics:  VSWITCHES are run by a set of redundant virtual service machines, by default.  VSWITCHES are able to fail over with up to three real devices.  VSWITCHES can be configured to be VLAN aware.  Up to 2,048 virtual network interfaces can be coupled to a single VSWITCH.  Ports on VSWITCHES can be configured either USER based or with port numbers.  Both access and trunk ports can be configured for VSWITCHES.  VSWITCH network interfaces always operate
